Powers -- Female Human Legendary Cleric (Cold Domain)
Attributes (17 Points):
Agility: d12 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d10 Strength: d10 Vigor: d12
Skills (22 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d8 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d12
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Performance: (spi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d10 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Thievery: (agi) d12
Gambling: (sma) d6 Psionics: (sma) d4
Skill Notes: Holy Symbol: May reroll Faith when holding holy symbol
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 24; Edge: 2; Skill: 10
Features
Edges (2 points): Arcane Background (Cleric (Cold Domain)); New Powers Hindrances: Arcane Sensitivity; Driven; Poverty; Shamed Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Cleric): Has Holy Symbol and Vow+ features
Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Poverty: Starts with half funds, loses half funds each wk
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Cloak With Hood Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d10+d4 R3"); Sickle (d10+d4); Unarmed (d10+d0); Whip (d10+d4)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Arcane Sensitivity: -2 to resist powers
Whip Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
Arcana
Power Count: 7 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Arcane Protection: (1 PP) R10" Foes suffer -2 (Raise -4) on arcane attacks and damage against target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; Epic +2 PP foes suffer -4 (Raise -6))
Banish: (3 PP) R10" Target suffers Shaken (Raise 1 Wound; Spirit neg), returns to native plane if incapacitated (Epic +1/+2/+3 PP 1"/2"/3" radius)
Barrier: (2 PP) R10" Creates a 5" long (Raise 10") by 1" high wall w/hardness 10 for 5 rd (+0 PP Immaterial barrier; +0/+1 PP Immaterial/material barrier inflicts 2d4 damage; +1 PP Barrier has hardness 12 (Raise 14); +1 PP Shapes barrier; +1 PP Dbl dimensions; Epic +1/+2 PP Immaterial/material barrier inflicts 2d6 damage)
Beast Friend: (1/Size PP) R10" Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min (+1 PP Target can use beast's senses; +1 PP Duration 30 min; Epic +2 PP Effects magical beasts)
Blast: (3 PP) R20" 2" radius inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+0/+1 PP 1"/3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6); Epic +4 PP Inflicts 4d6 damage (Raise 5d6) as Heavy Weapon)
Blessing: (10 PP) RCommunity 1 hr ritual increases crops, health, and prosperity in area
Blind: (2 PP) R10" Target suffers -2 on vision tasks (Raise -4) (Vigor neg 2 points (Raise 4) each rd) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Vigor-2)
Bolt: (1 PP) R20" Inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6); Epic +2 PP Turns target to dust (Vigor neg); Epic +4 PP Inflicts 4d6 damage (Raise 5d6) as Heavy Weapon; Epic +2 PP ROF 2)
Boost/Lower Trait: (3 PP) R10" Target gains +1 Trait step (Raise +2) for 5 rd or suffers -1 Trait step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 step (Raise all) each rd) (+2 PP/additional target; +1 PP Spirit-2; Epic +2 PP Free reroll of affected Trait 1/rd or -2 affected Trait)
Burrow: (2 PP) R10" Allows target to merge into earth and move half Pace (Raise full) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Allows burrowing through stone)
Burst: (2 PP) 9" Cone or 12" stream inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6); +1 PP Pushes 2d6" (large or greater d4"); Epic +4 PP Inflicts 4d6 damage (Raise 5d6) as Heavy Weapon)
Confusion: (2 PP) R10" 2" radius inflicts Distracted or Vulnerable (Raise both) for 1 rd (+0/+1 1"/3" radius; Epic +2 PP Also inflicts Shaken)
Conjure Item: (2/lb PP) R10" Creates mundane item for 1 hr (+1 PP Complete set; +1 PP/lb Daily food; +1 PP/lb Lasts until dispelled)
Curse: (5 PP) RTouch Target suffers 1 level fatigue and additional level each sunset (Spirit neg) (Epic +5 PP Inflicts fatigue each rd (Spirit neg); incapacity turns to stone)
Damage Field: (4 PP) R10" Creatures adjacent to target suffer 2d4 damage for 5 rd (+2 PP 2d6 damage; +2 PP 2" radius; +2 PP May move area of effect 10"/rd; Epic +4 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage as Heavy Weapon)
Darksight: (1 PP) R10" Target ignores 4 points (Raise 6 points) of illumination penalties for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target; Epic +2 PP Ignores all illumination penalties and 4 points from invisible creatures)
Deflection: (2 PP) R10" Foes suffer -2 on choice of ranged or melee attacks (Raise both) on target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Detect/Conceal Arcana: (2 PP) R10" Target can detect supernatural effects (Raise also type) for 5 rd or conceals target aura (Detect neg) for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target; +1/+2 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Detect-2; +1 PP Detect supernatural good or evil; +1 PP Identify magic item properties (Raise also any curse))
Disguise: (2 PP) R10" Target assumes another's appearance (familiar Notice-2 sees through (Raise Notice-4)) for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Allows changing size by 2 steps)
Dispel: (1 PP) R10" Ends targeted power (Casting suffers -2 if backgrounds differ; opposed arcane skill neg) (+1 PP Disrupts magic item for 1 rd (Raise 2 rd); +1/+2/+3 PP 1"/2"/3" radius; +3 PP Affects all active powers; Epic +8 PP Affects all in 2" radius around self for 5 rd, summoned creatures take 1 Wound/rd (Spirit neg))
Divination: (5 PP) RSelf 1 min contact with otherworld force grants arcane skill roll to gain information (Epic +3 PP on sacred ground gives advice)
Drain Power Points: (2 PP) R10" Drains 1d6 Power Points (Cast suffers -2 if backgrounds differ; Raise adds drained Power Points to self; Spirit neg) (+2 PP Drains 2d6 PP)
Elemental Manipulation: (1 PP) R10" Self uses element to attack for 2d4 damage (Raise 3d4), move 1' cu object 10', Push target, or perform special effect for 5 rd (Epic +3 PP Inflict 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6), affect 3x volume, or inflict Push w/-2 to resist; +5 PP Summon weather)
Empathy: (1 PP) R10" Self learns target emotions and surface thoughts, gaining +1 Intimidation, Persuasion, Performance, and Taunt (Raise +2; Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Charm target; +1 PP Lasts 5 min; Epic +2 PP Discerns lies)
Entangle: (2 PP) R10" Restrains target (Raise binds; Athletics or breaking Hardness 8 frees) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts 2d4 damage; +2 PP Hardness 10; Epic +1 Inflicts 2d6 damage)
Environmental Protection: (2 PP) R10" Target gains protection from hazards for 1 hr (Raise 8 hr) (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Reduces environmental damage by 4 (Raise 6))
Farsight: (2 PP) R10" Target sees up to 1 mile for 5 rd (Raise halves range penalties) (+1 PP/additional target; Epic +2 PP Removes all range penalties (Raise dbl sight range))
Fear: (2 PP) R10" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg; Raise Spirit-2, fear table +2) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; Epic +2 PP Spirit-2 (Raise Spirit-4))
Fly: (3 PP) R10" Target gains fly Pace 12 (Raise Pace 24) for 5 rd (+2 PP/additional target; +5 PP Pace 24 (Raise Pace 48))
Growth/Shrink: (2/Size PP) R10" Target gains or loses Toughness and Strength step (Spirit neg) for 5 rd (Epic +2 Lasts 5 min; Epic +2 Shrink retains Toughness and Strength)
Havoc: (2 PP) R10" Distracts and throws 2d6" creatures in 2" radius, 12" stream, or 9" cone (Strength neg) (+1 PP 3" radius; Epic +2 PP Throws 3d6")
Healing: (3 PP) RTouch Restores 1 Wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr (+10 PP Restores older Wound; +20 PP Heals crippling injury; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease; Epic +2/+3 PP Affects 2"/3" radius)
Illusion: (3 PP) R10" Creates 2" radius visual illusion (Smarts neg; Raise Smarts-2) for 5 rd (+1 PP Illusion includes sound; +2 PP Smarts-2; +1 PP 3" radius; +1/+2 PP May move illusion 12/24 each rd; Epic +3 PP Arcane skill vs. Smarts (Raise Smarts-2) Shakes target (Raise Wounds); Epic +2 Lasts 5 min)
Intangibility: (5 PP) R10" Target becomes unaffected by physical world (Spirit neg) for 5 rd (Epic +3 PP/additional target; Epic +3 PP Lasts 5 min)
Invisibility: (5 PP) R10" Target becomes invisible; foes suffer -4 sight-based actions (Raise -6) for 5 rd (+3 PP/additional target; Epic +2 PP Lasts 5 min or until attacks)
Light/Darkness: (2 PP) R10" Creates 3" radius (Raise or 5" beam) bright light or darkness for 10 min (+1 PP Attaches to object or moves effect 10"/rd; +1 PP Illuminates object, negating 2 points (Raise 4 points) of vision penalties; Epic +2 PP Light affects 10" radius, range 20"; Epic +2 PP Darkness blocks infravision, low light vision, and darkvision)
Locate: (3 PP) RSelf Gives direction of chosen item (-2 if self has never seen item; running water neg) for 10 min (+1 PP Self learns best path to target)
Lock/Unlock: (1 PP) R10" Inflicts -4 to open (Raise seals shut) on target item or opens target item, ignoring 4 points of penalties (Raise disarms alarms and traps) (+1 PP Alerts self if unlocked)
Lower Trait: (3 PP) R10" Target suffers -1 Trait step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 step (Raise all) each rd) (+2 PP/additional target; +1 PP Spirit-2; Epic +2 PP -2 affected Trait)
Mind Link: (1 PP) R10" Two targets may communicate up to 1 mile telepathically (Raise 5 miles) for 30 min; Wound to one shakes the other (Smarts neg) (+1 PP/additional target; Epic +2 PP Broadcast telepathic message in 40" radius (Raise 80" radius); Epic +3 PP Self may link to any familiar mind on same plane)
Mind Reading: (2 PP) R10" Self gains 1 truthful answer from target (Smarts neg) (+2 PP Extended access to target's mind)
Mind Wipe: (3 PP) R10" Target forgets up to 30 min (Raise several hour) event (Smarts neg) after 1 min activation (+1 PP Edits memory; +2 PP Activate power as an action; +2 PP Completely remove topic from target memory)
Mystic Intervention: (20 PP) RSpecial Ritual causes great event
Object Reading: (2 PP) RTouch Self sees history of target related to desired information (Epic +2 PP Share w/others nearby)
Planar Binding: (8 PP) R10" Summons and traps extraplanar creature to perform service (Spirit neg)
Plane Shift: (4 PP) R10" Self travels to chosen plane, w/in 10d10 miles (Raise 5d10) of known location (+1 PP/additional target; Epic +1 PP Creates extra-dimensional shelter; Epic +2 PP Plane shifts foe (Spirit neg) for 3 rd (Raise 5 rd))
Protection: (1 PP) R10" Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +2 Toughness) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Puppet: (3 PP) R10" Target obeys self (Raise complete control; Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+2 PP/additional target; +2 PP Spirit-2)
Relief: (1 PP) R10" Removes choice of Shaken, Distracted, or Vulnerable (Raise 2 choices) from target, or reduces penalties due to Wounds and Fatigue by 1 (Raise 2) for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target; +3 PP Restore 1 die type from energy drain (Raise 2 die types); +1 PP Also removes Stunned)
Resurrection: (30 PP) RTouch Successful -4 casting roll returns 1 yr corpse to life with 3 Wounds and 2 fatigue (Raise 0 Wounds) (+5 PP Raises 10 yr corpse; Epic +10 PP 12-hr ritual raises corpse of any age)
Sanctuary: (2 PP) RTouch Evil creatures cannot attack target (Spirit neg; Raise Spirit-2); attacking ends (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; Epic +1 PP Spirit-2 (Raise Spirit-4))
Scrying: (3 PP) RSelf Gives view of chosen target (-2 unfamiliar target; Spirit target detects) for 5 rd (+1 PP Shares with allies in 10" radius)
Shape Change: (3+ PP) RSelf transforms into animal form (Raise +1 Strength and Vigor) for 5 rd (+1 PP Lasts 5 min; Epic +3 PP Transforms touched target (Raise Smarts lowered to animal; Spirit neg, Spirit-2 recover (Raise Spirit-4)); Epic +2/+3 PP Transforms willing touched/R10" target)
Sloth/Speed: (2 PP) R10" Target suffers half Pace (Raise movement is an action; Spirit ends) or gains dbl Pace (Raise ignores -2 running penalty) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional Speed target; +2/+3 PP Sloth slows all in 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Speed reduces target multi-action penalty by 2; +1 PP Sloth Spirit-2; +2 PP Speed target runs maximum speed)
Slumber: (2 PP) R10" Target sleeps (Spirit neg; Raise Spirit-2) for 1 hr (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Smite: (2 PP) R10" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP +4 damage (Raise +6) as Heavy Weapon)
Sound/Silence: (1 PP) R50" Creates sound up to shout (Smarts neg) or R10" mutes 3" radius for 5 rd (+1 PP May move effect 10"/rd; +0 PP Affects target (Spirit neg); +1 PP/additional targets; Epic +1 PP Target audible for 1 mile; Epic +1 PP Smarts-2)
Speak Language: (1 PP) R10" Target speaks unknown language for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target; Epic +2 PP Speak, read, and write all languages; Epic +5 PP All in 20" radius can understand each other)
Stun: (2 PP) R10" Stuns target (Vigor neg; Raise Vigor-2) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Summon Ally: (2+ PP) R10" Creates obedient servant (Raise servant may take 1 Wound) for 5 rd (+1 PP Servant gains combat edge; +2 PP Servant can fly Pace"/rd; +1 PP Servant gains +1 Trait step; +1 PP Self can use servant's senses; Epic +Half PP/additional servant)
Summon Animal: (Special PP) R10" Brings chosen animal type to perform task for 5 rd (+1 PP Increased Trait; +1 PP Self can use animal's senses; Epic +Half/additional animal)
Summon Monster: (Special PP) R10" Brings chosen monster type to perform task for 5 rd (+1 PP Increased Trait; +1 PP Self can use monster's senses; Epic +Half PP/additional monster)
Summon Undead: (Special PP) R10" Brings chosen undead type to perform task for 5 rd (+1 PP Increased Trait; +1 PP Self can use undead's senses; Epic +Half PP/additional undead)
Telekinesis: (5 PP) R20" Moves items remotely as Strength d10 (Raise d12; Spirit neg) for 5 rd (Epic +3 PP Strength d12 (Raise d12+2))
Teleport: (2 PP) R10" Target teleports 12" (Raise 24") (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Touch teleports foe (Spirit neg); Epic +5 PP Opens portal to destination for 5 rd; Epic +5 PP Teleport up to 1000 miles)
Time Stop: (10 PP) RSelf Self gains 1d4+1 additional turns
Wall Walker: (2 PP) R10" Target moves at half Pace (Raise full Pace) on vertical and inverted surfaces for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP) R10" Target gains combat edge effects (Raise improved version) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; Epic +4 PP Two combat edges)
Wish: (20 PP) R10" Self alters reality, loses 3 PP permanently (Raise no PP loss)
Zombie: (3+ PP) R10" Animates and controls corpse for 1 hr or stores PP for permanent (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Target is armed and has 2 Armor points; +1 PP Self can use target senses; +1 PP Target becomes animated skeleton)
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Cleric): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
